The Spirit of Youth
The Paddock, Rookery Grounds, Marazion, Cornwall Prizes - 1st £6, 2nd £3, 3rd £2. March contest (Ever Ready) - 1st(1) St Pinnock, 2nd(10s.) St Erth. Promoted by Marazion Town Band. 6 bands competed.
